author: jmcnally
msg: patch by Skip Walker <skipwork@skipwalker.com>
Adds a counter to the local variables @constraintname and @reftable, fixing the
bug described in
http://www.mail-archive.com/turbine-user@jakarta.apache.org/msg07101.html

author: jmcnally
msg: James reminds me that the last patch was unneeded.  reverting.

author: jmcnally
msg: patch by James A. Hillyerd <james@hillyerd.com>
When using Torque HEAD with PostgreSQL, BOOLEANCHAR doesn't work.  The
attached patch fixes it by comparing the the value.asString() result
with both "Y" (original code) and "true" (what Village returns for
PostgreSQL).

author: jmcnally
msg: patch by Bill Schneider <bschneider@vecna.com> to add native limit
support for oracle

author: jmcnally
msg: Some patches by Humberto Hernandez Torres <hhernandez@itweb.com.mx> submitted
for the mssql templates and applied by me to the sybase templates as well, to
1. not add size info to TEXT (and INT) column types
2. handle tables with no pk's
3. use CHAR for CHAR jdbc type
I also added a maxColumnLength=30 property and filled in some of the empty types
in db.props for sybase, based on what was in mssql.  I did not change anything
that was in disagreement between the two.
